title: Call of Duty®: Infinite Warfare

notes: Crashes with a Fatal DirectX error, just like everyone else. Someone managed to run the standalone non-Steam version under Wine in Lutris. I replicated his configuration into Proton, but it still would not work, which leads me to believe it might be an issue in the steam version. Either way, not starting until whatever is broke is fixed.
title: Call of Duty®: Infinite Warfare
